Class ViewGroup_ListViewAdapt

java.lang.Object
  BaseAdapter
      com.example.bacsafe.ViewGroup_ListViewAdapt

public class ViewGroup_ListViewAdapt
extends BaseAdapter

Custom List View Adapter for View Group Page. Used to display User's username, first and last name, BAC and total drink count

Author:
Team BAC Safe
